alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 2:57AM EST until November 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches. Winds gusting 25 to 35 mph in higher terrain. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis, Northwest Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis, and Northern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could cause isolated damage to trees and power lines due to heavy wet snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow totals will be confined to the North Woods along the Quebec border.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
